result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 旺角亞皆老街8號朗豪坊商場12樓12 舖
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 旺角亞皆老街8號朗豪坊商場12樓12 舖
result.name: Sichuan House 川莊

reviews.text:
Hot and Spicy Sichuan restaurant. Yes, if you are looking for Spicy, hot, and ma-la spicy, it is the right choice. The tea with many ingredients was very good to calm down my mouth and keep it up to finish all. 

Besides, it still offers many well designed and prepared Chinese cousin. Even you don't like spicy one, it is still worthy to try.

Coming from the other side of the world, I found this lovely little restaurant to be so friendly and helpful. The staff made sure I understood what I was ordering and removing the language barrier difficulties. The food tasted delicious, but didn’t come out at the same time. I realize this is a cultural shift, but I struggled with all the bones in the chicken, I’m just not used to it, and did the best I could. Thank you for your wonderful hospitality!

Delicious. Tried the recommended boiling fish dish (shui zhu yu) . The soup flavour is good and not very oily. Lucky the waiter suggested hot level 2 instead of what we initially chose, level 3. It was sufficiently numbing hot. However, the next time here, I won't choose this fish again. It is popular, the cheapest, but I'm guessing it is tilapia; a farm fish with a good texture that too often taste muddy.
The crowd on Wednesday at 8:30pm was few. Waiting time was less than 10 minutes.

This is my second time to Sichuan House, post a discovery session of Sichuan House with my husband on a holiday last June. 

The food here is delicious to say the least. I’ve got a tooth which doesn’t like a very high spice level and that is catered for here. When I came with my husband, we tried the hotpot and this time around when I flew in, I wanted to try a whole host of other dishes which were just plain amazing (a few of the amazing-ness is shared in the form of photos), all this topped with the 8 Treasures tea which is given as an equivalent to water. (Pssst... They have packs of tea for sale, just in case you fall in love with it.)

The restaurant is bustling always and it just is proof for why it’s as amazing as I think it to be.
Excellent Sichuan food with good variety of dishes. Highly recommended.

result.name: Sichuan House 川莊

reviews.text:
Hot and Spicy Sichuan restaurant. Yes, if you are looking for Spicy, hot, and ma-la spicy, it is the right choice. The tea with many ingredients was very good to calm down my mouth and keep it up to finish all. 

Besides, it still offers many well designed and prepared Chinese cousin. Even you don't like spicy one, it is still worthy to try.

Coming from the other side of the world, I found this lovely little restaurant to be so friendly and helpful. The staff made sure I understood what I was ordering and removing the language barrier difficulties. The food tasted delicious, but didn’t come out at the same time. I realize this is a cultural shift, but I struggled with all the bones in the chicken, I’m just not used to it, and did the best I could. Thank you for your wonderful hospitality!
水煮魚，麻辣味ok,但魚片不夠滑，而且過咸。反而其它小食沙冰味道很好。最大缺點係限時1.5小時，不適宜一班人聚餐。侍應態度都幾好!

Delicious. Tried the recommended boiling fish dish (shui zhu yu) . The soup flavour is good and not very oily. Lucky the waiter suggested hot level 2 instead of what we initially chose, level 3. It was sufficiently numbing hot. However, the next time here, I won't choose this fish again. It is popular, the cheapest, but I'm guessing it is tilapia; a farm fish with a good texture that too often taste muddy.
The crowd on Wednesday at 8:30pm was few. Waiting time was less than 10 minutes.
前夜光顧。印象最好是服務。價格中上，七人点了12款食物，每人260元。食品水準亦了得，酸菜魚好滑，十三味醬雞很好味、微辣水煑牛好香、印象最深係乾煸茶樹菇，超級好吃！不過也是跟其它旺場食店一樣，1.5小時需交枱。对於我老人家，是較趕
